about.description: This library contains an add-on to FEniCSx enabling the possibilities of enforce multi-point constraints

name: dolfinx_mpc

test:
  commands:
    - pytest -vs python/tests
    - mpirun -n 2 pytest python/tests
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
    - pytest-asyncio
    - python-gmsh
    - scipy
  source_files:
    - python/tests
about:
  description: 'This library contains an add-on to FEniCSx enabling the possibilities
    of enforce multi-point constraints

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/jorgensd/dolfinx_mpc
  doc_url: https://jorgensd.github.io/dolfinx_mpc
  home: https://github.com/jorgensd/dolfinx_mpc
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Multi-point constraints with FEniCS-X
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: dolfinx_mpc
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jorgensd
    - minrk

about.description: This library contains an add-on to FEniCSx enabling the possibilities of enforce multi-point constraints
